channel.title: Compiler Error
channel.description:
Can Someone Help Me With This Error I got.
client.java:7777: illegal start of expression myPlayer = this.playerArray[this.myPlayerIndex] = = new Player(); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Edit: I get 10 Errors.

client.java:24: class XMLLoader is public, should be declared in a file named XM LLoader.java public class XMLLoader ^ XMLLoader.java:24: duplicate class: XMLLoader public class XMLLoader ^ client.java:84: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader for (int k = 0; (k < arrayOfString.length) && (arrayOfString[k] != null); ++ k) ^ client.java:84: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader for (int k = 0; (k < arrayOfString.length) && (arrayOfString[k] != null); ++ k) ^ client.java:86: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader if (!(arrayOfString[k].contains("name="))) ^ client.java:88: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader String str1 = arrayOfString[k].substring(arrayOfString[k].indexOf("name=") + 6).replaceAll("\".*", ""); ^ client.java:88: operator + cannot be applied to .indexOf,int String str1 = arrayOfString[k].substring(arrayOfString[k].indexOf("name=") + 6).replaceAll("\".*", ""); ^ client.java:88: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader String str1 = arrayOfString[k].substring(arrayOfString[k].indexOf("name=") + 6).replaceAll("\".*", ""); ^ client.java:89: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader String str2 = arrayOfString[k].substring(arrayOfString[k].indexOf("interfa ceType=") + 6).replaceAll("\".*", ""); ^ client.java:89: operator + cannot be applied to .indexOf,int String str2 = arrayOfString[k].substring(arrayOfString[k].indexOf("interfa ceType=") + 6).replaceAll("\".*", ""); ^ client.java:89: cannot find symbol symbol : variable arrayOfString location: class XMLLoader String str2 = arrayOfString[k].substring(arrayOfString[k].indexOf("interfa ceType=") + 6).replaceAll("\".*", ""); ^ 11 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
